import React,{useEffect} from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {fetchUsersRequest} from '../redux/slices/userSlice' const Users = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {users, loading,error} = useSelector((state)=>state.users) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(fetchUsersRequest()) },[dispatch]) if(loading)return

Loading users...

if(error)return

Error:{error}

return(

Users List

{users.map((user, index) => ( ))}
Full Name Email Role Phone Address Date of Birth
{user.name}
{user.email}
 {user.role}
{user.phone}
{user.address}
{user.dateOfBirth}
) } export default Users
